cab.content: THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTYS GOYEBNMENTPrinted f or the War Cabinet. December 1944. SECRET. W.M. (44) 165th. and 166th Conclusions Copy No.WAR CABINET 165 and 166 (44).CONCLUSIONS of Meetings of the War Cabinet, held at 10 Downing Street,S.W. 1, on Tuesday; 12th December, 1944, at 3 p.m. and 5-30 p.m.Present:The Right Hon. Winston S. Churchill, M.P., Prime Minister (in the Chair).The Right Hon. C R. Attlee, M.P.,Lord President of the Council.The Right Hon. Sir John Anderson,M.P., Chancellor of the Exchequer.The Right Hon. Oliver Lyttelton,M.P., Minister of Production.The Right Hon. Anthony Eden, M.P.,Secretary - of State for ForeignAffairs.The Right Hon. Ernest BEvrN, M.P.,. Minister of Labour and NationalService.The Right Hon. Herbert Morrison,M.P., Secretary of State for theHome Department and Minister ofHome Security.The following were also present:The Right Hon. Viscount Cranborne,Secretary of State for DominionAffairs.The Right Hon. A. V. Alexander,. M;P., First Lord of the Admiralty.The Right - Hon. Sir archibald sinclair, Bt., M.P., Secretary ofState for Air.Sir Orme Sargent, Deputy Under-Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs(At 5-30 p.m. Meeting only.)Marshal of the Royal Air Force sir charles F. A. Portal, Chief of theAir Staff.Colonel the Right Hon. oliver stanley, M.P., Secretary of Statefor the Colonies. (For part of 3 p.m.Meeting only.)The Right Hon. Sir James Grigg,M.P., Secretary of State for War.(At 3 p.m. Meeting only.)The Right Hon. Sir Stafford Cripps,K.C., M.P., Minister of aircraft production.Admiral of the Fleet Sir andrew cunningham, First Sea Lord and. Chief of Naval Staff.Field-Marshal Sir Alan Brooke, ChiefOf the Imperial General Staff. (at p.m. Meeting only.)Secretariat:Sir Edward Bridges. General Sir Hastings L. Ismay.Sir Gilbert Laithwaite.Foreign Affairs. The War Cabinet had two discussions on the latest develop-Greece. ments in Greece. A record of the discussions and of the conclusions(Previous reached is kept in the Secretary's Standard File of War cabinet reference: Conclusions.W.M. (44) 164th : \ -Conclusions,Minute 2.)Offices of the War Cabinet, S.W. 1,12th December, 1944.[28871-4]
